Speaker: Lynch
Text: Mr. Kane... wake up... Mr. Kane!

Speaker: Kane
Text: What?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I need you to cover your head.

Speaker: Kane
Text: What did you say?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Just cover your head NOW!
[The van rolls over. While Kane lies unconscious vaguely watching what is happening, Lynch deals with the police.]

Speaker: Police
Text: You are surrounded. Now come out here with your hands up...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hold out your fucking cuffs!
[He breaks the handcuffs on Kane with a rifle shot.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Get on your feet! Follow me! We’ll cover you.
[The police and Lynch's accomplices shooting and running around here and there.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Follow me. Into the Alley! Over here! This way! You ok? You got shook up pretty bad...

Speaker: Kane
Text: What the fuck is going on?

Speaker: Masked man
Text: I strongly advise you to do as you're fuckin' told!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Who the fuck are you to talk to me like that??

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Your glory days are long gone - old-timer... And stop feeling sorry for yourself!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: The truck is down - we'll need another way out.

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Shit! We have a problem – we need a new pickup.

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Got it. We’re heading north. They’ll extract us near the airport. And I don’t want any trouble from you two. NOW MOVE!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: They already got a chopper up.

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Get some smoke out - We need cover!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: We gotta find cover! We’re sitting ducks here! Move on!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Use smoke as cover!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Mr. Kane! Get inside NOW!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Return fire!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: If we stay here, we'll die!

Speaker: Kane
Text: You smell that? Smells like gasoline!
[They burn out the police cars with the policemen.]

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Through the hole... Let's move! Move out! Go! Go! Move it!
[One of masked men throws a smoke grenade.]

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Fire in the hole! That should keep 'em off our back.

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: CLEAR!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Yeah, we're near the airport. Yeah, yeah, I see it... we'll be right there. They'll pick us up at the donut shop!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: The door is locked!
[The police shoots him through the door.]

Speaker: Masked man
Text: How many of them are there?!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Shit!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Shit! Get DOWN! GET DOWN! Return fire!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: Shit! We gotta get out of here! Shit... Here we go again.

Speaker: Masked man
Text: The doors open!! No good here -we need to move NOW! Choppers should be off our back! No ﬂy zone this close to the airstrip. Not far to go - now move! And shoot anything blue that fucking moves! Head for the donut shop now! GO! GO! GO!  WHERE THE HELL ARE YOU?! ...Yes… We can hold it… JUST FUCKlNG GET HERE. They’re only 2 klicks away. The pickup is on the way!

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: So where the hell are they?!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Just shut up and hold your position. They'll be here! There they are. I see them! Kane. WE ARE LEAVING! Get ready! 3… 2… 1! Go! Go! Let's go! Let's go!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Where are we going?!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: I think you know. Cover their fucking heads!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hey! Get your hands off me!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Relax Lynch, you'll be fine.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: This was not part of the deal!

Speaker: Masked man
Text: What deal? Fuck it then, just stay calm.

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: That's more like it.
[Kane is brought to a parking lot and taken out of the van with a bag on his head.]

Speaker: Masked man
Text: Get them out of here.

Speaker: Masked man 2
Text: We've got a small surprise for you.

Speaker: Man with scars
Text: Kane. I've been dreaming of this moment for 4 years.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I thought you were all dead...

Speaker: Man with scars
Text: I should fucking cut you up right here and now...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well, why don't you?

Speaker: Man with beard
Text: Oh, rest assured that we will... You betrayed us Kane. You left us behind and you ran with it all.

Speaker: Kane
Text: The fuck I did.
[The man with scars hits him in the leg.]

Speaker: Man with beard
Text: Kane, we don't have time for this. We have both your wife and your daughter.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You've got what? I don't believe you... I wanna talk to them!

Speaker: Man with beard
Text: Shut up! I tell YOU what to do! You know I have to kill you, but I'm offering you a chance. Bring it all back and I'll let them go.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: I'm sorry Kane, but you know we can't bend the rules.

Speaker: Man with beard
Text: I treated you like a son... You have 3 weeks. No more.

Speaker: Man with scars
Text: You know what to do. The car is over there, it should have everything you need. (he gave him a cell phone]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Name's Lynch.

Speaker: Kane
Text: What's the phone for?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I'll be reporting back to them every morning and night

Speaker: Kane
Text: Great, a lurking watchdog...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: If I don't call them back with good news, they'll start with your wife.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Not as long as you do exactly as I say. Let’s see what they left us in the car.
[He inspects the trunk of the car.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: This should be all we need for now. Take this, it's an earpiece. Don't ever take it out.  Not so fast, this one is for you.
Action: (Lynch takes a gun from the trunk)

Text: [They take some practice.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shit, and I have to keep this idiot alive! Listen. You won't survive long like that.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What do you mean? Did you see that shot?

Speaker: Kane
Text: It's not yours shoot. I m sure it's great. It's about you not getting shot. I need you alive so you can keep making those phone calls. Just do as I do and try to keep as close to your cover as possible.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: So what’s the plan?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm gonna pick it up tomorrow and give it back to The7.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Just like that? So you DO know where it is?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just back off.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What exactly did you steal?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I didn't steal anything! I thought they were dead.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Ok. Ok... None of my business anyway.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Exactly... Now get over to that scaffolding.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What for?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just do exactly as I say.
[They go to the scaffolding.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Pick up the rope. I'll show you how to rappel.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I fucking hate heights.
[Lynch takes out a medicine bottle and swallows a few pills.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: What are they for?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Nothing serious, it’s just for my stomach. Been taking them since forever. It’s...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just pick up the damn rope. Fuck!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Ah, shit! Where did they come from?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck, they must've heard the shots. Let's get down to the exit.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck, just what we need. Still wanna rappel down?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Of course not. We take the stairs.
[They leave the parking and go to the city.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You still haven't answered me. What are we gonna do?

Speaker: Kane
Text: We just pick it up and give it to them. I know where it is.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: So you stole it and tucked it away.

Speaker: Kane
Text: The fuck I did! I've never even touched it. I just happen to know who took it and which bank he stashed it in. Is that so fucking hard to believe?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It's in a bank? Fuck! I don't know how to rob a bank.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well, I do. And if you just shut up about The7 and everything and let me handle it, I know a good vaultbreaker who'll help us out.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What's keeping them?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't worry. He's never late. Here they are. Let's go.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Right on time.
[They approach the truck, from which an old man comes out.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Hey. I'm glad you could make it.

Speaker: Old man
Text: It's my pleasure. Never thought I'd see you again.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Neither did I. Who's the driver?

Speaker: Old man
Text: He's cool, don't worry.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok, so we're clear on the plan?

Speaker: Old man
Text: Sure, risky but doable. We'll get in there, quietly past the outside guards. Then you put the fentanyl gas in the vents up there, knocking out the lobby and securing us lots of hostages in case things get hot. Rappel to the loading bay. Fight to the vault. I open it. We exit through the front doors where Driver will be waiting for us.
[Kane goes to the back of the bank, stunning the guards along the way.]

Speaker: Guard
Text: Hey you! What are you doing here?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Let's get the hoods on. Ready?

Speaker: Old man
Text: We got company.

Speaker: Kane
Text: All clear.

Speaker: Guard
Text: What the fuck? Intruders! GET THEM!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just keep me covered.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Long enough.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch, secure the lobby.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck no! I’m coming with you!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just do it! And keep things quiet until we get back.

Speaker: Old man
Text: Do as Kane says!!! We need all the hostages. Hey! I need to keep an eye on you.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't worry, we'll be up there soon.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: They're not gonna like this.
[Kane and the old man get to the safe. The old man begins to open it.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Your hands are shaking... thought you sobered up.

Speaker: Old man
Text: I did. But that shit never really leaves you. Keep 'em all my back!

Speaker: Old man
Text: Got the first one. 5 to go!

Speaker: Old man
Text: 2 down! Still got 4 left! Got it!

Speaker: Old man
Text: Ok. Which locker? You got a key code? You're stealing your own shit?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Not your concern.

Speaker: Old man
Text: Not my concern... Not my fucking concern?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shit. It must be here...

Speaker: Old man
Text: This is bullshit!

Speaker: Kane
Text: We gotta open them, open them all.

Speaker: Old man
Text: Look. I've always trusted you!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Then don't lucking question me! Just blow ALL of them!

Speaker: Old man
Text: Ok. Ok, you fucking prick. But after this, you and I are done.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! What’s going on up there?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Are there more cops?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It’s so hot in this Goddamn gas mask… I got it under control.

Speaker: Old man
Text: We're done! Shit is gonna blow in 10 seconds - NOW RUN!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Dammit! Shit! Shit! Fuck! That old fucker took it!

Speaker: Old man
Text: Have you checked all of them?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hey, what's happening down there?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Oh, everything's cool, Lynch. We are done down here. Let’s go.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: GET DOWN YOU FUCKS! Fuck... Get away from me… Where the luck did you come from? Trying to sneak up on me, are you? You stupid fuck. I've already killed you twice.
[Kane walks over to the place where Lynch was supposed to keep the hostages, but finds there only a shitload of corpses.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You want some?! I'll fucking give you some! Bitch! Fuck... Get away from me... Why do you keep doing that? You stupid fuck. What are you looking at?! Is that all you got?! Stop!! You're only taking it. Fake this!! Understood?! What are you?! A

Speaker: Old man
Text: Jesus fucking Christ! He killed the hostages. How fucked is that?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: LYNCH – STOP! That are you doing?!

Speaker: Lunch
Text: WHAT? Where the fuck have you been?
[Lynch continues to randomly kill hostages.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Hey! Stop killing hostages!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I’m not!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Snap out of it Lynch!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Snap out of it? What the fuck is that supposed to man?

Speaker: Kane
Text: We gotta get out of here... Driver. What's the situation outside?

Speaker: Driver
Text: Well, it’s bad. Snipers everywhere and the cops have pretty much sealed off the whole area.

Speaker: Kane
Text: If we clear the way, can you pick us up?

Speaker: Driver
Text: Well worth a try, just remember, the meter is running.

Speaker: Police
Text: I repeat! Surrender your weapons and come out with your hands up... We have the place surrounded.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Get down! I'll shoot the rest of you motherfuckers if you I up something stupid!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Still got the bag with grenades?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Sure, over there.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It's teargas!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Throw them back out! Get away from the entrance!
[Finally, the Driver manages to fit his van to the entrance to the bank.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Get in!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: That was great! We got away!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Great? What the fuck happened back there?!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I... I told you! The gas mask was hot and...

Speaker: Kane
Text: So you kill everyone?!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Listen! It was really warm. I couldn't see. And the police were everywhere... I'm telling you, they were swarming!

Speaker: Kane
Text: But why did you kill the hostages?!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Why? What do you mean? They were waking up. They wouldn't stay still... I just tried to stop them.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't fucking talk to me. You just get your shit together. You hear me?!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: But at least we got away.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Nobody gets away with what you just did…

Speaker: Driver
Text: FUCK! When you ladies are done chatting…
[The police are chasing the van.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: You just step on it!

Speaker: Driver
Text: As long as you keep them off our backs!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I would if this van wasn't swerving so GODDAMN MUCH!

Speaker: Driver
Text: You wanna drive, you fucking shit?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Both of you! Shut up and focus!  What are you doing? Get up here and help!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I can’t...

Speaker: Kane
Text: What? Now you suddenly can’t kill the cops??

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I can't... I mean… fuck what happened back there?

Speaker: Kane
Text: You don't remember?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Oh shit! Oh shit!Oh shit! Why do I always fuck up...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! I need your help here! Snap the fuck out of it!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: How many did I kill?

Speaker: Kane
Text: More than you wanna know.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Damn it! I black out sometimes. I get violent and it’s so fucking horrible afterwards. I thought I could control it. I can! I can! I just need a few more of these.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Those ain’t exactly ulcer pills are they?

Speaker: Driver
Text: Hang on! They blocked the tunnel! You gotta clear the way or we're fucked!

Chapter: CLEAR THE WAY OR WE'RE FUCKED
Speaker: Driver
Text: Alright. We better get this shit done quick, I want the fuck out of here!

Chapter: CLEAR THE WAY OR WE'RE FUCKED
Speaker: Lynch
Text: I need some cover here.

Chapter: CLEAR THE WAY OR WE'RE FUCKED
Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok. Let's get the van forward. Get back in the van!

Speaker: Kane
Text: So what’s the deal? You just get violent now and then?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It's a little more complicated than that.

Speaker: Kane
Text: No shit.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I get black outs. Lose control - I don't know, sometimes it just clicks.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Jesus Christ.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What do you care?! We got what The7 want. Let's just get it back to them.

Speaker: Kane
Text: It wasn't all there...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You gotta be shittin' me...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Driver, can you get as off the road?

Speaker: Driver
Text: I’m trying!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I can't believe we didn't get it all. The7 ain't gonna like this.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just tell them that I'm getting their stuff. I know I can get the last briefcase.

Speaker: Driver
Text: OK, there’s a subway up a head. HANG ON!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shit it’s leaking gas! We gotta move! What about the others?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Leave ‘em! Nothing we can do!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Get down to the tracks!
[They descend to the stations. There they are overtaken by the police.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Here it comes! Get ready!
[The train is coming.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: About fucking time.
[They get in it and leave.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: So you know how to at the rest? I fucking hope it's a better plan than the last one.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't have a plan yet. But I know a girl that might help us get the briefcase.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah, and what if she won't?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Then you'll just have to make her. I'll get us both passports.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Passports? What the fuck for??

Speaker: Kane
Text: ‘Cause she runs a club in Tokyo. You'll hate it.
[They arrive in Tokyo.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: We could've gone to the hotel first. 12 hours on a fuckin' plane, my neck is killing me!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Stop bitching, we still got a long night ahead of us.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Bitching? I'm not bitching. I just hate being ignored. Could you at least tell me why you think she can get the briefcase, or you don't know?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just do as I say and we'll get it. Keep it down!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hey! You still answer to me you arrogant fuck!  Relax. I got nothin'.
[In the club.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You're right. I already hate this place. All these rich, spoiled brats…

Speaker: Kane
Text: Her office down the back. Just do your best to blend in. If she finds out I'm here, it’s gonna be hell getting to her.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: She won't even see you? That’s just great.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Look. Lynch, we've been through this conversation over and over again. Just stick to the plan.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: This place is stressing me out.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Then take your pills!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Took the last one on that damn plane. Hate flying. Fuck! I hate people sweating on me... Where’s her office?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Up the stairs. Now shut up.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Oh you’re so fucking full of yourself.

Speaker: Bouncer
Text: Hey! No access.
[He quietly kills him.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shit! Be careful!

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't think anybody noticed.

Speaker: Club owner
Text: Kane! What are you doing here?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Please, take it easy.

Speaker: Club owner
Text: I'm surprised to see you. Did my security let you in?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I let myself in.

Speaker: Club owner
Text: Does my father know you're here?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm pretty sure he doesn't.

Speaker: Club owner
Text: So, what made you come crawling back?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Yoko. I need your help here.

Speaker: Yoko
Text: And why would I help you?  You wouldn't.
[Lynch hits her in the face couple of times.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: That’s enough.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Whoa, she's all limp! I didn't even hit her that hard.

Speaker: Kane
Text: It just makes our job easier.
[He throws Lynch a roll of duct tape.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What's this shit?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just business, Lynch. Her father has the briefcase.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: For Christ sake. You just got your own daughter kidnapped.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You had this all planned. You fucking psycho.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Let's just get her out of here.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Just make sure I don't get shot.
[They go through the club shooting guards. Lynch carries Yoko.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Beating up and kidnapping women. You must think you are a big man, you cold son of a bitch.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! Get over here... I've found the fire exit.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Nnng...

Speaker: Yoko
Text: Do you know who I am?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shut her the fuck up!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Where is the Goddamn duct tape?

Speaker: Yoko
Text: I'm Retomoto's daughter you fuck head.
[She hits him in the balls.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Arrgg. Fuck.

Speaker: Kane
Text: We have to get to her!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Retomoto?! What have you made me do?! Why didn't you tell me who she is?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Because you would ﬂake out if you'd known.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Flake?! I wouldn't have done it if I knew.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just get a grip. We have to get hold of her. Fuck! The windows.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: She’s not that stupid.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Pick her up!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Why can't you carry her!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Yeah, it's me… Are you ready?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Who the hell are you talking to?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Our backup. We'll be down shortly. Everything is fine.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You mean we have backup?! Why didn't we bring ‘em?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Because they can't know who she is. We need them for the exchange. Stay still!
[He pulls out a phone and dials a number.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Mr. Retomoto. This is Kane... I know... I'm sorry, but I need my briefcase hack... Ungag her. I'll let your daughter explain.

Speaker: Yoko
Text: The fucking bastard kidnapped me. Whatever happens don't let him get away with...

Speaker: Kane
Text: I know how you feel but I don't have a choice either... 2 hours. The Nan Lu intersection, by the pagoda. We can still make this work.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I have to give you that. You got some balls.

Speaker: Kane
Text: What?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Dealing with Retomoto... hanging with his daughter and all. Did you bang her?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck you! We all make mistakes and so what.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Nothing.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Then just back off. I'm a little fucking edgy. All right?
[The next scene. Lynch, Yoko and Kane, along with several of his men, stand on the bridge and watch the pagoda where the meeting with Retomoto should take place.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: You ok?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah, yeah. Let's just get this over with. Is he there yet? I can't see him...

Speaker: Kane
Text: He's there all right. Time to move. You stay here and don't do anything unless I ask you to. You'll be fine.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Sure, sure. We'll be fine up here.  You and me, right?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane, can you see anything yet? I can't see shit.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Not much, it's pretty dark. Just keep looking.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah. Yeah. I'll, keep looking.

Speaker: Kane
Text: And keep calm, Lynch.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What the fuck do you mean by that? I am calm.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Stay here. I'll do the talking.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What the hell is going on down here?

Speaker: Kane
Text: It's alright...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: No, this is not cool. Fuck! If there is no one down there... Where are they?
[Kane walks up to the pagoda and finds a ringing phone. He picks it up.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Retomoto... I was hoping to see you in person.

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: Mr. Kane. I don't have the patience for your blackmail.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You don't have a choice. You know I'll kill her.

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: I do. But if we took the time to sit down and find a solution...

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't have time.

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: Kane. Relax. I'm aware of what happened between you and The7. I know about your daughter too.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm listening...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What’s going on down there?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! Keep quiet.

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: You may find it hard to trust me. But there is a way we can solve this.

Speaker: Kane
Text: What’s on your mind?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Don't fucking negotiate! Just get the damn briefcase!

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: Kane, we've done business before. I think in this case we have some common interests. We both stand to gain, if we get rid of The7.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I'm serious! Just do as I tell you and don't fuck around...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch, shut up!

Speaker: Retomoto
Text: Is there a problem?

Speaker: Kane
Text: No. No problem. Just give me a sec. Lynch! Calm the fuck down!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Stand still, you bitch! What the fuck you bi… Damn girl just won't stay still... Stay down!
[A shot is heard.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: LYNCH! Retomoto! Don't…
[Retomoto’s men begin to attack the pagoda from all sides.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! There are snipers everywhere. I need you to handle it for me! Grab the rifle. Can't you see him? Next to the van. 2 o'clock.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I got him. I think we got 'em all.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Are you sure she's dead, Lynch?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Could you calm down! I just saved you from snipers.

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Text: [Kane and his men are trying to leave the pagoda and get to the bridge.]

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Speaker: Kane
Text: What happened up here?

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shit! I just tried to stop her.

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Speaker: Kane
Text: Is she dead?

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Speaker: Lynch
Text: I don't know. Guess so. I was aiming for her legs...

Chapter: I WAS AIMING FOR HER LEGS
Speaker: Kane
Text: Ah fuck! You fucking idiot! I can't believe you.... What the fuck is the matter with you?
[On the bridge.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: You just can't do anything right, can you!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It’s not my fault!

Speaker: Kane
Text: What are you saying?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Things were cool, 'till you started your own agenda, making deals and all that.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I was negotiating, you twisted fuck!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Sure you were. You were a traitor once, why should that change?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I should shoot you right here and now!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Relax. We can still catch up with them and get the briefcase!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't you understand? It's gone. We are out of time.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You fucking quitter!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Call me what you want.
[They get in the car.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Call The7. Tell them I'm coming. Tell them I got what they want. I’ll have to take my chances.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah, sure. Good luck with that.

Speaker: Kane
Text: They have my family. I can't run.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I'll make sure you don't. Soon as I hand you over, my job is done. I don't need no trouble.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You just don't get it, do you?! You're as dead as I am.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I don't think so, buddy.

Speaker: Kane
Text: And what is that supposed to mean?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I have a deal with them.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Yeah, right.
[In the next scene, we make a small leap in time. Kane tried his luck in the fight against the seven and lost. He and Lynch were brought at an abandoned construction site.]

Speaker: Man
Text: You fucking lying traitors. You promised.
[He hits Lynch with his rifle. He loses consciousness and we hear voices in his head for a while.]

Speaker: Voice 1
Text: You can become one of us, Lynch. All you have to do is watch his every move...

Speaker: Voice 2
Text: ...and when he is dead, you get his seat.

Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: I hate this! It's ruining our lives!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: But Annie, I'm getting better! These pills seem to be working much better. Annie, I'm home... Annie? Where are... Annie? Honey wake up. Honey? Honey, wake up. Oh God no. No God don't do this to me, Goddamn you God... No! No...
[Lynch comes to his senses.]

Speaker: Man with scars
Text: Sure you did! Hey, don't get me wrong Kane, I'm tucking thrilled it turned out this way.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I just need a little more time. You don't have to involve my family. They don't even know me.

Speaker: Man with beard
Text: Kane, stop. I can't listen to your pathetic excuses anymore. You failed. That's all there is to it.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos, help me here.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: There is nothing I can do for them.

Speaker: Kane
Text: That's a fucking lie.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: I'll see to it that they get buried somewhere nice. Goodbye old friend.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Wait... you're leaving?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: We are flying to Havana tonight. It has already begun. Mute will take it from here. Your family will be here in an hour.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Do I get to talk to them?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Of course you do.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Like you can fucking believe that...

Speaker: Man with scars
Text: Fucking bum!
[He hits his with his leg. Lynch loses consciousness again and when he wakes up, Kane’s family has already been brought.]

Speaker: Kane’s Wife
Text: Easy now Jenny, it's gonna be alright. Just stay close to me.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny, don't cry. Please.

Speaker: Man
Text: Get on your knees.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Wait! Wait. I have to speak to them.

Speaker: Kane’s Wife
Text: I should have known it was you. You pathetic, selfish little shit. How could you do this to us?! We just got our lives back on track.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm sorry. I never thought they'd find you. It's gonna be ok. Trust me. Jenny please, look at me, Baby. I wrote you a letter...

Speaker: Kane’s Wife
Text: Trust you! Why couldn't you just stay dead!

Speaker: Kane
Text: No wait! Let me talk to them!
[The man shoots Kane's wife in the head. Seeing this, Lynch blacks out again.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You fucking liars! Kane! Get up and fight!
[A bloody fight begins. In the end, Kane smashes Mute with a shovel.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: You should have let me talk to them! YOU SHOULD… HAVE LET… ME TALK TO THEM

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Oh shit, there's more of them.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny! Keep your head down! It's not over yet. I'm sorry. I'll fix it.
[Kane picks up a gun and shoots the remaining thugs.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: The rest are running away.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Yeah, but you never know. Cover me. I need to talk to my daughter.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Are you hurt? Look at me! Are you ok? I promise no one will hurt you. Let me see your face.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Huh?

Speaker: Kane
Text: It's gonna be fine. Please. I won't let anyone do anything to you. I swear.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane?

Speaker: Kane
Text: What happened back then... I wrote you a letter.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane!

Speaker: Kane
Text: What?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Listen!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Please, you can't stay with me. It's too dangerous. Just run!
[Enormous truck arrives.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny! GO NOW!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Sure that was a good idea? Sending her off like that?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I didn't have a choice, did I?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Well, I don't know.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Listen, I gotta do some things that she shouldn't see, so you just shut up and help me carry my wife.
[They bury Kane's wife on the construction site.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm so sorry... I'm so sorry it ended like this and I'm sorry I couldn't just die. But I swear, I'll find them all before they find Jenny. I'll kill them all before they even look at her.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What's that?

Speaker: Kane
Text: A list... of dead men like me. Disowned and ruined by The7. They want revenge and nobody else is coming with me.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I should be on that list too.

Speaker: Kane
Text: The fuck you should. You don't want revenge, you just wanna stay alive.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You self centered shit. I'm not leaving you out of my sight until The7 and Retomoto are dead.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well I don't know it I want any...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Deal with it! Listen, my wife was murdered 5 years ago. Back then I didn't do shit about it. I'm not gonna make the same mistake again. I wanna kill them as much as you do.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Your choice. Get in, the men we need are only an hour away.
[They sit in an enormous truck and drive away.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You know where they are?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Some. We killed most of them, some we can't find. But there's a whole crew in a prison not too far from here.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What?! You wanna do a breakout? We fucking just got out of prison.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Hey. Do you wanna come or not? These guys are all in one cellblock. It's gonna be quick.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Ah, I don't like this. I need more pills.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You're not gonna be needin' 'em too much longer.
[Having sped up, they break through the prison wall.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: No going back now.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Let's just fucking do it!
[A shootout with the prison guards begins.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shoot the glass!!!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Ha, ha, ha. Always wanted to do this.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Watch out, snipers in the tower! We gotta get to the Control room to open the doors. Now move!
[They find the control room.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Thapa, Rific, Shelley, Grimley, Madsen. Thapa, Rific, Shelley... Grimley, Madsen. Shit! They should all be here!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What's wrong?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok. Rific's here. That’s good.  Rific! Get on your feet!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What, there's only one guy here? Where the hell are the others?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Rific must know.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fucking hope so. Let's find out.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Kane... Thought I recognized your voice. Never thought you'd break in here just to kill me.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Rific, don't flatter yourself. I'm only here because The7 wants me dead and you've no fucking choice but to help me kill them before that happens.

Speaker: Rific
Text: The7 wants you dead? Ah. I love the irony of this, you fucking idiot.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Do you wanna come, or not?

Speaker: Rific
Text: I don't know.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You'll be paid, you greedy bastard. Just get out here and fight.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Where are the others? I need your entire team.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Grimley and Madsen got fried last year!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck.

Speaker: Rific
Text: But Thapa is doing laundry work and Shelly has transferred to block B.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: This wasn't the plan, Kane.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shut up! We'll just take what we can get.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Follow the orange line. It leads to the laundry room!
[Kane finds the laundry.]

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Kane, back off! Just because I'm not armed, doesn't mean I can't kill you.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: Are you gonna get us out of here, or what?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Up against the wall, punks!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Thapa, this is not a time to bear a grudge. I need your help.

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Me helping you?! You assholes RUINED MY LIFE.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I'm not a member of The7 anymore. Follow me... And take this.
[He gave him a rifle.]

Speaker: Thapa
Text: You're not?

Speaker: Rific
Text: The one eyed fucker got himself expelled, huh. Isn't that just great?

Speaker: Thapa
Text: No shit!

Speaker: Rific
Text: Yeah, we're picking up Shelly too!

Speaker: Thapa
Text: We are?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Kane! Over here! There you are. Kane. I hope you can forgive me for what I have done.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't give a fuck, Shelly. I need to get you out.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Out? Ah, he must have sent you here to....

Speaker: Kane
Text: Spare me your God talk, we don't have time. How do I lift the lockdown?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: You gotta get all the way up in the control room.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Alright, good. We'll be back to you.

Speaker: Rific
Text: And now you're taking a fucking weapon? What happened to finding God and all that?

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Just a death row things I guess.

Speaker: Rific
Text: You're full of shit.

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Yeah, maybe, just get a move on, okay. I want out.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I need everybody on here now! Need all the distraction we can get.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: What the fuck? You're letting them all out?

Speaker: Rific
Text: Sounds like they're getting slaughtered down there.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Hey, I see you! Down here!

Speaker: Rific
Text: That’s Shelly. He's still alive.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Can you get out?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: No. It only opened to the yard. You'll have to open the last gates from the tower.

Speaker: Kane
Text: What tower?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Just fucking go on. You can't miss it. Kane? You know I won’t work with Lynch.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You know Lynch?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: I know of him. He killed his wife. Did a real nasty job of it too.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Wait a second, you killed your wife?!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: This isn't the time for talking and fuck your preacher boy! You don't know shit!

Speaker: Kane
Text: If I’d known that you killed your wife.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Then what?

Speaker: Kane
Text: I wouldn't have fucking brought you along.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hey. I really don't think I killed her.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You don't THINK you killed her? What the fuck is that supposed to mean? They're fucking crazy!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: It means I can't remember shit from that night. But I'm probably not responsible for my wife's death, that’s more than you can say, right? Thought so… So leave it.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Oh fuck! We’re dead!

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Fuck! The stairs are burning! We have to rappel down.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Kane look, I appreciate this, but keep Lynch away from me. I don't work with psychos.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You fucking work with who ever I tell you to.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: It's not right! It's not worth it.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Look, I know how rich you're gonna get. And I'm telling you, it's worth it.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Fuck it then.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Like you're a fucking saint...

Speaker: Kane
Text: Knock it off!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: We'll need a fucking tank to get out of here!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Get in the prison transport. It's armored.
[They leave the prison in the prison’s truck.]

Speaker: Rific
Text: Fuck, that was close. I can't fucking wait to get back at The7.

Speaker: Kane
Text: We’re going for Retomoto first.

Speaker: Rific
Text: We're what?

Speaker: Kane
Text: After what you did to Yoko, he'll be looking for Jenny with everything he's got.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You can't continue to blame me for that! It wasn't entirely my fault!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just forget it Lynch. Besides, I want my briefcase back.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: I can't believe we're going back. I can't fucking believe it.
[Next scene. Kane and his team are standing on the roof of a building in Japan. They are wearing a hoodie.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Get a move on – we're almost at the top now.

Speaker: Rific
Text: These clothes suck. I mean, I just got out of prison...

Speaker: Kane
Text: They got your ass all the way up here, didn't they? Now keep it down, we still have to make it across the roof.
[They kill the helicopter pilot and his guards.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok. Listen. I rappel down first - plant the bomb on the window. When it blows - you hit that room with everything you got.

Speaker: Everyone
Text: Got it.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck I hate heights. I can't believe we’re going through with this.
[Kane rappels down.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch. The briefcase is there! And Retomoto won't even see us before he's dead.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Mmm... If you say so.

Speaker: Kane
Text: You have 7 sec, 6 sec, 5 sec, 4 sec, 2 sec, 1 sec, NOW!

Speaker: Rific
Text: Let' em all!
[Going down to the meeting room, Kane smashes the glass with explosives and the whole team starts firing at the people inside.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Secure the room while I get the briefcase.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I owed you this for a long time. And I pay my debts. To the penny.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Come on. You're the one talking about keeping momentum and shit.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Some things just shouldn't be rushed.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: That the fuck was that for.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Nothing. Let's just get down to the elevators and get the hell out of here.
[The door to the office break out. Kane and his crew are fighting to make their way to the elevator.]

Speaker: Rific
Text: Shit! - They just keep comin'!
[In the elevator...]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What was that shit you did to Retomoto?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Nothing to do with you.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: As long as you're not losing it. Get these suits on, all of you!

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Who made you the boss, wife killer?

Speaker: Kane
Text: C'mon, Shelly, this isn't the time.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah, just suit up.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just keep it cool...

Speaker: Policeman
Text: Please Gentlemen, abandon the building. We have a minor issue on the top floor.

Speaker: Kane
Text: We are gonna be fine. We just need to get out to the car... we're almost there.
[A shootout begins.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Driver. Where the hell are you?!

Speaker: Driver
Text: Sorry Kane, there are fucking cops everywhere. Look, just continue down the street, there’s an overpass. I'll meet you there.

Speaker: Kane
Text: We'll try.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: There they are! You fuckers! Don't be so fucking QUIET!!!
[Lynch shoots at passersby.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! Cut it out! They're no threat.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Lynch! Relax, just take a deep breath. You're going to be ok.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Don't fucking patronize me!

Speaker: Driver
Text: Kane. Where the hell are you?! C'mon! You've gotta hurry!
[They get in the van.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: So, we're good?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Very good… Now we can get to The7. They're in Havana.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: But isn't there a civil war?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well, It's their specialty to overthrow governments, Lynch, that's what they do. Havana is their retirement job.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Why the hell would they wanna retire?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Everybody retires, look at us! We're way over the hill for this business.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I'm not.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fine, you're not, but The7 definitely are. And they need a place to hide out from all the shit they've done.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hmm. My wife always wanted to go to Havana. She said it was pretty.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Believe me, it's not.
[The next scene throws us in the midst of the battle. All gang members wear military armor.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Oh Fuck! Oh Fuck! Oh Fuck! My ears are bleeding! I can't take any more of this shit!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just get on your feet! We're moving in NOW!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Now?!You're going to get as all killed, you idiot.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't give a shit. As long as we get The7. Alright! We’re nearly there! The reinforcements are waiting for us just behind the Church.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Kane, we need a break.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well, you can't have one. I promise, today we kill The7. And today you get your reward.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Thapa, he's right. We're gonna die if we stay.

Speaker: Kane
Text: MORTAR! Let's move.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Got here as fast as we could. How many of you are left?

Speaker: Commander
Text: Plenty. We're ready.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Now let's move!

Speaker: Commander
Text: Shit, we can't afford lose men at this rate.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok, listen to me. Lynch and I will try to get to the roof and see what we can do.

Speaker: Rific
Text: That's fucking more like it! Do some of your own dirty work for a change.

Speaker: Kane
Text: The rest of you, round up all the reinforcements you can and be ready to attack on my toe.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You're getting them all killed. You know that.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't give a shit. If the men die, they fucking die. I just want to see my daughter again.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You know what, you cold piece of shit? I'm beginning to think you did leave The7 to burn in Venezuela.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just keep up Lynch.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: OK. You lead the way, you're so fucking smart.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't worry, Lynch. I will.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Doesn't look too bad, Rific. Don't think that there's more than a few BTRs.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Just get rid of them! We're ready down here. Lots of good men joining us. It’s looking good.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: We fucking did it!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Rific. We got them. Are you ready?

Speaker: Rific
Text: Sure. Sure we are.
[Helicopter fly by.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck!

Speaker: Rific
Text: Wow! What the fuck was that?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Just stay put, Rific.

Speaker: Rific
Text: We got it.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Rific, get everybody out! Now!

Speaker: Rific
Text: Thapa, Shelly. Let's Go! Kane, keep us covered.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Now is our chance. Let's move in.

Speaker: Rific
Text: Over there... let's rappel down.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Spread out! Spread out! Our only way is through file side entrance! Lynch and I are going in this way. I need the rest of you to secure the other entrances. No one gets out alive.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shit... where the hell are Carlos and the brothers?

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Fuck The7! Where's the stash?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: They should be here. They should all have been here!!

Speaker: Shelly
Text: I asked you a question!!

Speaker: Carlos
Text: There is nothing here.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: The brothers took it all. They knew we were losing and they ran.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: What do you mean there is nothing here?!

Speaker: Kane
Text: Shut the fuck up. Get him down here now!  Carlos. I'm only gonna ask you this once. Tell me where the brothers are. I need to find them.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: They just ran. But I can lead you to them. Fucking backstabbing traitors! Didn't even try to get the rest of us out.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Just do it.

Speaker: Kane
Text: How fast can you get me to them?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: 3 days.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: This is stupid. You can't trust him.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Well, what the fuck! I don't have a choice.

Speaker: Thapa
Text: Kane, I can't trust you anymore. You're on your fucking own. I'm done fighting for nothing.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: How can you trust him?

Speaker: Kane
Text: He has always been my friend.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah, right... You know the rules, Kane! Remember? Or have you taken too many bumps on your fucking head?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Look! He knows where the brothers are, end of story.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I think you're losing your focus, old man. And so did Thapa.

Speaker: Thapa
Text: I don't give a shit about Thapa. He's so fucking greedy we're probably better off without him.
[Next scene. The Jungle.]

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shit. I hate all this walking.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos says this is the safest way in.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What?! We‘re taking orders from that prick now?
[They go through the jungle.]

Speaker: Kane
Text: So this is it?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Yeah. You see the hacienda up at the end? That's where the brothers stay.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Looks more like a boot camp to me.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Well. You know how they are.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Big airfield... trafficking from here too?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Of course, but very low key.

Speaker: Kane
Text: No radios?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: No, none at all. Only Alarm flares to worry about. If we can get in the valley without any going off, we'll have a chance to get to the brothers.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: All very nice, but where is our payment in all this? We're not leaving empty handed again.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: There’s tons of heroin in the village. You can pick up as much as you can. Just help us into the valley and make sure to secure the airstrip. Quick! Get them before they fire off any ﬂares.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: It hit the cliff!

Speaker: Carlos
Text: We got lucky with that one. Just be careful when we get to the poppy fields. Great, the bridge is up.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Don't worry. This gorge is the only plate we can rappel in to the valley.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I need you to come over here.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: We’ll have to take them by surprise. We can't let them get away. The Hacienda is too close. Don't let the jeep get away! We need to kill them all! Quiet. They should be on the other side.

Speaker: Shelly
Text: Who?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Yeah. What the fuck are you talking about?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Calm down. Carlos contacted some friends before we left. They should be waiting torus on the other side.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I bet they are. Kane, are you stupid?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! These men are loyal to both Carlos and me.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Loyal? Is that even a real word to you?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Lynch. You don't know what you're talking about, so shut up. We need all the help we can get.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What... You're just sending them away?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: We need them to go and secure the airfield. We don't want the brothers to slip away, and I think we have a better chance of getting close on our own.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You want to take the Hacienda? Just us??

Speaker: Carlos
Text: And a few backups.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: That's suicide.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: We won't go head on. We'll create a diversion and slip in.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: A diversion.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Call it what you want.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Now where did that fucker go?

Speaker: Kane
Text: He'll be back.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You don't know that. It's been 15 minutes now.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: I found it.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Whoa! Keep that thing away from me!

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Relax. As long as it doesn't receive any bumps, you'll be ok. We'll place it on the main gate and blow it from a distance.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: And then what?

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Then we'll follow the ridge to the back. Is that so fucking hard to understand?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Don't patronize me, Carlos.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: This track leads to the main gate. It's the safest approach.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Good. Lynch, we will cover you from up here. You rappel down and plant the bomb on the gate.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: What? The hell I won't. You go.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Christ! Listen, I'm a much better shot than you are.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Either you go yourself or I'll fucking kill you now!

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Easy crazy boy.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos. We'll cover you.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Ok, I’ll do It. Why the hell dill we bring him?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Just get a move on. Carlos.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! I'm only sending Carlos because I know you would fuck up.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Whatever. As long as it’s not me crawling around with that mine.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Move!

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Just give me a second.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Ok, good.

Speaker: Carlos
Text: Soy yo Carlos.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos? You with me?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck! I told you. Didn't I?

Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos! What's happening?

Speaker: Lynch
Text: That fucking traitor...

Speaker: Kane
Text: We have to move fast.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: You idiot. You just won't accept it, will you. You shouldn't have trusted him.

Speaker: Kane
Text: I said let's move!

Speaker: Shelly
Text: I'll bet they're waiting to us.

Speaker: Radio
Text: It's Carlos. How the hell did he get out of Havana?

Speaker: Radio
Text: You're lucky I'm here...

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Wait, wait, hold on. What are they saying?

Speaker: Radio
Text: You see what I said? Kane is probably here as well. When are you finally gonna listen to me?

Speaker: Radio
Text: Trae a Jenny aqui arriba. AHORA!

Speaker: Lynch
Text: Wait, wait, wait, wait. Did he just say Jenny?

Speaker: Radio
Text: Asegurate que la chica este arreglada, queremos que Kane la retonozca si nos atata.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck! They found her! I'm gonna rip their heads off.

Speaker: Lynch
Text: I told you it was a bad idea to send her out like that.

Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch! Don't fucking go there!
[Kane and Lynch go the hacienda.]

Speaker: Radio
Text: Sorry old friend. I'll miss you, but you shouldn't have listened to Kane.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck. What was that?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Carlos... They just shot Carlos.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [They find Kane’s daughter.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny? Jenny, are you hurt?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Thapa
Text: Step back. One more false move and I’ll kill you.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Just let her go.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Man with beard
Text: Kane, what's wrong with you? Look what you're putting your little girl through. And your old friend Carlos.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Leave her alone!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Thapa
Text: Leave her alone? Do you hear that? That's Kane's favorite solution.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane. The mine.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [Kane shoots it.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny! That little fuck took her!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Take cover! We’ll get her back.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: He's getting away!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane! He won't get far! Shelly and Rific got the airfield.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: C’mon! They're heading for the airfield. Get in now!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Where the fuck did you come from?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [Kane gets in the jeep.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: We've been trying to contact you for 30 minutes now. The others got ambushed in the village. It's all fucked. Listen! (we hear the shootout on the radio]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: I don't give a fuck about the men! He's got my daughter and a fucking plane waiting for him! Just shut that thing off and drive!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane! We can't leave them to die!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Look, without his brother around, that scumbag could do anything to her.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Shelly! Rific! Can you hear me? We're on our way. It's fucked. They can't hear us. No. I think some of it is slipping through.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Shut up! I think I see them!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Is Jenny there?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: She has to be!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: This is it. It's straight ahead. Shit. They closed the gates.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Let's just get off and fight our way in.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lunch
Text: No wait! We can get around the fence.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Get a fucking move on!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lunch
Text: There's more on the right! There's mare on the left! There's more on the right!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [Kane and Lynch chasing the plane with Jenny on board...]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Get a move on! Faster! She's on that plane. Don't you get it?!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Relax I’m trying. I can't go any faster! We're nearly there! Here we got! Shoot out the engines. Keep an eye on the towers! Just shoot the engines!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Faster!! It's taking off!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lunch
Text: Alright! Get the other one! It's stopping!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Let's tucking finish this.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [Kane gets out of the jeep.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: You stay here. I'm gonna kill him myself. Jenny!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane! Don’t you get it? She doesn’t wanna be saved by you.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny! I'm coming to get you. Jenny! Just hang in there! It'll be over soon! Jenny? Jenny. I'm here now. Are you alright? Baby, let me hold you...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: Get the fuck away from me, you murderer!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: What? But why...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: I said get the fuck away.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny. I'm your father.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: Shut up! I should fucking kill you! You abandoned us...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Honey. I'm sorry, I...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: For 14 years! Until we get dragged from bed and mom gets shot because of some shit you have done.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Where did you go?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: The police of course. They told me you were a murderer, running from death row! Then the brothers found me and told me what you did to them.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny, these men...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: You fucking traitor! Why couldn't you just die...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: I will... But first I'm getting you out of here, if you hate me or not. You understand? But we have to move fast.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [Kane lead Jenny out of the plane.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Just stay close to me. It will all be over soon. Careful. We'll be gone soon. Just a little longer. Can you make it?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: I don't have a fucking choice, do I?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Hang in there! We're close!! How many of you are left? I repeat. How many of you are left? Come in...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: They can't hear you, Lynch. Let's just get to the chopper.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: But what about the men? We can't just ﬂy out.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny. Follow me.  I swore I'd kill them all... I swore I’d fix this... I could get her out now. I don't owe them shit! They all knew the risk. But I'll have to let them burn. Not in front of her.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane!! Kane. What's it gonna be?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Fuck it.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [At this point, we are offered a choice - to fly away by helicopter or save Kane’s team. They go to the village.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny! This way.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: What? You want to bring her along?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: She stays with me, Jenny. I promise everything will be ok.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: I fucking hope you know what you're doing.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Lynch. I don't leave people to burn. Not anymore.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Rific
Text: Kane? Lynch? Carlos? This is Rific.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Rific, I'm coming to get you out. Who's with you?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane, it's no use. They can't hear you.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Rific
Text: Kane! This is Rific. We're burning down here. They can't hear us. Fuck. I can't believe we didn't see this shit coming. He's going to let us burn. Kane! We need you down here now!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: The fucker isn't coming back. Kane, you fucking traitor! You're not getting away with this! You piece of shit.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny. Stay close to me. We have to get them out.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane, this is seriously wrong.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Shut up. I'm gonna fix this. She'll be fine. Just stay close to me. Don't attract attention, but shoot to kill if you have to.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Rific
Text: Kane!! We're firing off alarm ﬂares now. It you can hear me, get us out. We're trapped in the church on the hill.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: Fuck Kane. He ran with it all. The son of a bitch.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Look! The ﬂare! Careful!! He's hit. Get some help over there.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: I know. But we can't just rush into this.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: You think we can get up those stairs? What a fucking lousy way to die. I'm gonna miss you. Fuck. There's only Shelly left. We don't wanna give her more than one of those. She's too small.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: Fuck! I'm bleeding. Fuck! You got me shot!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Don't worry. You'll be fine.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Jenny
Text: Fine? Fuck you! I'm gonna bleed to death. We'll never get away from here.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [They find the church.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't shoot! It's me!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: Kane? Where the fuck have you been?

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: We lost your signal. We didn't know.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Easy now. It's just a minor wound.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: You didn't know? Kane. I heard you “I don't give a FUCK about the men. Just shut that thing off and drive".

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Don't panic. Just stay close to me. I'll make sure it doesn't happen again.  Shelly. I had to get my daughter.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Doesn't matter. You're gonna die here too.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: We got here, didn't we? So you show some fucking gratitude.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: You idiot! We're fucking trapped here, for fuck's sake!! Stay trapped then. There's some boats at the pier. We’ll never get away from here.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [They fight their way out.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Come on. The pier’s burning. We have to hurry. Kane! I think Jenny is in trouble...

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny… Are you ok? Oh Goddammit. She's slipping away. I'll have to carry her. She can't be dead.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Kane. She's dead.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: SHUT UP!! SHE'S NOT DEAD! I JUST TOLD YOU.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck you Kane. I owe you nothing. That fucking boat's mine!

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Shelly
Text: Kane, she's dead, for fuck's sake.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: You just stay here or I'll kill you.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Text: [They make it to the boat.]

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: She'll be OK, Lynch. We got her out. I know she's gonna be OK.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Lynch
Text: Fuck you, Kane!  You should have taken that chopper. It was her only chance, just deal with it. You didn't even fucking know her.

Chapter: YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE LISTENED TO KANE
Speaker: Kane
Text: Jenny. Listen. I wrote you a letter. I have it here somewhere. It isn't finished. I wanted to send it to you, but there wasn't time. I know I should have written it earlier…
